text: Ryori is a launching site for sounding rockets in Japan at in Iwate Prefecture. Ryori has been in use since April 1970, but it is not used for launching satellites. ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20100131102750/http://astronautix.com/sites/ryori.htm Category:Rocket launch sites Category:Buildings and structures in Iwate Prefecture
title: Ryori
